messageBody:
It's in Chicago.

*********** REPLY SEPARATOR ***********

On 2002-08-02 at 20:10 Scott Stirling wrote:

>Where is this thing? I bet it's not in Boston. Why don't they have
>more things like this in Boston?
>
>Speaking of conferences, is anyone here planning to go to OOPSLA this
>Fall? Is OOPSLA good? I was thinking about maybe going.
>
>Scott Stirling
>
>> -----Original Message-----
>> From: J. B. Rainsberger [mailto:jbr@...]
>>
>>
>> Just a reminder for those who haven't yet left for XPU
>> (XP/AU?) and are joining us, I will be organizing a Birds of
>> a Feather meeting about JUnit, at Erik Meade's request. The
>> topics of discussion include extending JUnit, and I will be
>> talking a little about HTMLUnit, Mike Bowler's HTML
>> extensions to JUnit, an alternative to HttpUnit.
>
>
